Title: Burn It, Shred It, I Don't Care
Plot: Patty suspects there is more to Daniel Purcell's case than simple murder; Ellen secretly assists the FBI in their attempt to flip Tom Shayes and use him against Patty.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language,drug use and sexual references
Writer: Todd A. Kessler, Glenn Kessler, Daniel Zelman
GuestStars: Tom Aldredge, Zachary Booth, Glenn Kessler, Mario Van Peebles, Brett Cullen, Tibor Feldman, Timothy Hampton, Delaney Muro, Tom Noonan, Michael Pemberton, John Rothman, Paige Turco, Sharon Washington
